description: Retrieves the group access control entries for a template.

parameters.name: GroupSecurityIdentifier
parameters.description: Security identifier (SID) of the group object from Active Directory. The SID starts with 'S-'.

parameters.name: TemplateArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that was returned when you called CreateTemplate.

nested_items.name: AccessControlEntry
nested_items.description: An access control entry allows or denies an Active Directory group from enrolling and/or autoenrolling with a template.

nested_items.name: AccessRights
nested_items.description: Permissions to allow or deny an Active Directory group to enroll or autoenroll certificates issued against a template.

nested_items.name: AutoEnroll
nested_items.description: Allow or deny an Active Directory group from autoenrolling certificates issued against a template. The Active Directory group must be allowed to enroll to allow autoenrollment.

nested_items.name: Enroll
nested_items.description: Allow or deny an Active Directory group from enrolling certificates issued against a template.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the Access Control Entry was created.

nested_items.name: GroupDisplayName
nested_items.description: Name of the Active Directory group. This name does not need to match the group name in Active Directory.

nested_items.name: GroupSecurityIdentifier
nested_items.description: Security identifier (SID) of the group object from Active Directory. The SID starts with 'S-'.

nested_items.name: TemplateArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that was returned when you called CreateTemplate.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the Access Control Entry was updated.
